_comment: English translations for Docker Master Course (DockerCourseSeeder)

template.title: Docker実践マスターコース
template.description: WSL2 + Docker Desktop環境で学ぶ、初心者から実践まで完全対応のDockerコース。コンテナ化からCI/CD、セキュリティ、監視まで12週間で習得します。

Docker実践マスターコース.title: Docker Master Course
Docker実践マスターコース.description: Complete Docker course from beginner to practical level using WSL2 + Docker Desktop environment. Master containerization, CI/CD, security, and monitoring over 12 weeks.

Docker基礎.title: Docker Fundamentals
Docker基礎.description: Environment setup, Docker basic concepts, Dockerfile creation, basic commands
deliverables: Complete WSL2 + Docker Desktop environment setup
Create Dockerfile and build custom image

Docker中級.title: Docker Intermediate
Docker中級.description: Managing multiple containers with Volumes, Networks, Docker Compose
deliverables: Use Docker Compose for multi-container applications

Docker上級.title: Docker Advanced
Docker上級.description: Multi-stage Build, Healthcheck, Private Registry, Security
deliverables: Create optimized images with multi-stage build

Capstone Project.title: Capstone Project
Capstone Project.description: Complete E-commerce architecture + CI/CD + Production deployment

第1週：環境構築とDocker入門.title: Week 1: Environment Setup and Docker Introduction
第1週：環境構築とDocker入門.description: WSL2 + Docker Desktop setup, Docker basic concepts, architecture

第2週：Dockerfile作成と基本コマンド.title: Week 2: Dockerfile Creation and Basic Commands
第2週：Dockerfile作成と基本コマンド.description: Create Dockerfile, build images, basic Docker commands

第3週：Volumes & Networks.title: Week 3: Volumes & Networks
第3週：Volumes & Networks.description: Data persistence with volumes, container networking

第4週：Docker Compose.title: Week 4: Docker Compose
第4週：Docker Compose.description: Multi-container application management with Docker Compose

第5週：Multi-stage Build & Healthcheck.title: Week 5: Multi-stage Build & Healthcheck
第5週：Multi-stage Build & Healthcheck.description: Optimize images with multi-stage builds, implement healthchecks

第6週：Private Registry & セキュリティ.title: Week 6: Private Registry & Security
第6週：Private Registry & セキュリティ.description: Set up private registry, security scanning, best practices
